content: I’m not all that certain that Democrats want a congressional majority and the White House together. That would force them to produce legislation that might cut into their corporate donations or show voters their true corporate colors. It’s sad that anyone who might support the time proven New Deal economics doesn’t have a party to support them, but that’s where we are in America currently. There’s just no opportunity to cash in for politicians who promote the best interests of their constituencies. The establishment Dems took a look at Bernie’s sub $1million net worth after 30 years of service and rejected that model.
